meanings: attempt to smuggle oneself into Japan
stow away on a cargo boat[ship] to China

examples.korean: Anti-smuggling crackdowns have forced the illegal people movers to find new destinations. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 밀항단속은 사람을 밀항시켜주는 범죄자에게 새로운 목적지를 찾을 것을 강요해왔다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Anti-smuggling crackdowns have forced the illegal people movers to find new destinations. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He attempted to go as a stowaway on an American ship. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 미국 배로 밀항하려고 했다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He attempted to go as a stowaway on an American ship. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Smugglers lately have expanded their Japan trade, seeking people from countries other than China who seek higher wages. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 최근 밀항업자들은 중국 외 다른 나라에서 온 높은 임금을 받으려는 사람들을 찾는 동시에, 일본을 대상으로 밀항사업을 확대했다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Smugglers lately have expanded their Japan trade, seeking people from countries other than China who seek higher wages. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: In another case, a diplomat told a relief-seeker to stow away, since he was not a South Korean taxpayer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 또 다른 경우는 한 외교관이 도움을 요청하는 사람에게 밀항을 하라고 했다. 그가 한국인 납세자가 아니었기 때문이었다. Neungyule
examples.english: In another case, a diplomat told a relief-seeker to stow away, since he was not a South Korean taxpayer. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Those targeting Japan are often routed first to South Korea, where they're transferred to South Korean-operated freighters for the final leg of their journeys. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 종종 일본으로 향하는 사람들은 처음엔 한국으로 항로를 잡는 경우가 있는데, 이들은 한국에서 한국인 밀항 전문 범죄자에 의해 그들의 마지막 목적지로 갈아탄다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Those targeting Japan are often routed first to South Korea, where they're transferred to South Korean-operated freighters for the final leg of their journeys. Add to Wordbook
